title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Trip Itineraries
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries            Trip Itineraries        Andrew Cattoir        Discover      Discover Lake Mead NRA We have provided you with some handy recommendations depending if you are arriving from the North, South, East or West. No matter which direction you may be arriving from, Lake Mead NRA offers you a wonderful experience with nature.           Explore      Explore Lake Mead NRA Explore Lake Mead National Recreation Area’s wilderness! Lake Mead NRA has nine designated wilderness areas throughout the 1.5 million acres that form the recreation area. Many of the wilderness areas are remote with limited access, but these listed here are fairly easy to get to and have designated back country roads or are off of main roads within the park.
